homepage.desc1: SILSILA-E-MUHAMMADIA AMEENIA IDREESIA started in Pakistan when Al-Muhtarim Sayedi Sheikh Al-Hafiz Amin bin Abdur Rehman (صَلَّی اللہ علیہِ وَسلَّم پڑھنے والے), came to Pakistan after spending 40 years in Madinah Munawarah, Saudi Arabia. In few years Idreesia spread in every corner of Pakistan. Millions of people are now associated with it from every aspect of life

desc2.title: Blessings of Wazaif's
desc2.content: If one wishes to have Allah's distinguished blessings then one should recite Wazaif with devotion, love, fondness and regularity. According to Hadith Sharif, Allah likes those deeds which are done regularly without interruption. One who is loyal to Allah and his Prophet صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم will see miracles in all his matters (Inshallah). In this world and hereafter they will have a guarantee and security of the Holy Prophet صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم. They will have love of Holy Prophet صلی اللہ علیہ وسلم. Livelihood will rain down upon them. Impossible and difficult matters shall resolve Inshallah.

steps.2: Tap Apps & notifications and then Notifications
steps.3: Under 'Lock screen,' tap Notifications on lock screen or On lock screen
steps.4: Choose Show alerting and silent notifications
steps.5: On some phones, choose Show all notification content

sms_page.subscription_instructions: To receive teachings via SMS on your mobile, you need to subscribe every month.
sms_page.subscription_steps: To subscribe, write SUB in a message and send it to the designated number.
sms_page.confirmation_message: You will receive a confirmation message, and teachings SMS will be sent to your number for 30 days.
sms_page.renewal_instructions: After every 30 days, you will receive an SMS for subscription renewal. To continue your subscription, write SUB in a message and send it to the designated number.
sms_page.renewal_confirmation: You will receive a confirmation message, and teachings SMS will be sent to your number for 30 days.
sms_page.feedback_instructions: If you face any issues in receiving teachings SMS even after subscribing or need information regarding SMS, write FB, add a space, then write your message or issue and send it to the designated number.
sms_page.new_teaching_request: To receive the new teaching (LTS) via SMS at any time, write LTS in a message and send it to the designated number.

auth.invalidPassword: Password must contain 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase, 1 special character, and 1 number
auth.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
